sect1.title: The Conceptual Model of Data
sect1.para: Properties surrounded with brackets are entities identifiers. The User entity (and its relations) is displayed with a dashed style because it is part of the standard Django's database model.

sect1.title: The Codasyl Logical Model
sect1.para: The codasyl logical model resulting of transformation rules applied to the previous MCD model. The Django User record is displayed with a dashed style because it is part of the standard Django's database model.

sect1.title: The Relational Logical Model of Data
sect1.para:
Here is the relational logical model of data used to design the database:
Models are:
CalibrationKit
Calibration Kit (Calibration Kit Id, Name, Bad Pix Mask, Flat Field)
Cart Item
Cart Item (Item Id, Django's User Id, Processing Kind Id, Name, Data, Date)
Channel
Channel (Channel Id, Instrument Id, Name, Wave Length, Url, Wave Curve, Trans Curve, Mag Offsets)
Coaddition
Coaddition (Coaddition Id, ...)
Condor Node Selection
Condor Node Selection (Selection Id, Label, Node selection, Date, Is Policy)
Config File
Config File (Config Id, Django's User Id, Processing Kind Id, Name, Content, Data, Date)
Final Quality Comment
Final Quality Comment (Final Comment Id, Comment)
Final Quality Evaluation
Final Quality Evaluation (Django's User Id, FITSout Id, Final Comment Id, Date, Grade, Custom Comment)
First Quality Comment
First Quality Comment (First Comment Id, Comment)
First Quality Evaluation
First Quality Evaluation (Django's User Id, FITSin Id, First Comment Id, Date, Grade, Custom Comment)
FIST Tables
FITS Tables (Table Id, Name, Instrument, Channel, Run, QSO Status, Object, FITS Table, Absorption, Absorption Err, Is Phot)
FITSIn Plugin
FITSIn Plugin (FITSIn Id, Processing Task Id, RA offset, Dec offset, RA std dev, Dec std dev, Minimum PSF FWHM, Average PSF FWHM, Maximum PSF FWHM, Minimum PSF half-light diameter, Average PSF half-light diameter, Maximum PSF half-light diameter, Minimum PSF elongation, Average PSF elongation, Maximum PSF elongation, Minimum PSF chi2/d.o.f., Average PSF chi2/d.o.f., Maximum PSF chi2/d.o.f., Minimum PSF residuals, Average PSF residuals, Maximum PSF residuals, Minimum PSF asymmetry, Average PSF asymmetry, Maximum PSF asymmetry, Minimum number of PSF stars, Average number of PSF stars, Maximum number of PSF stars, Median background, Background RMS, Saturation level, Flat Path, Mask Path, Region Path, QualityFITS Config, Results Ingestion Log, HTTP Url, Previous Release Grade, Previous Release Comment)
FITSOut Plugin
FITSOut Plugin (FITSOut Id, Processing Task Id)
Image
Image (Image Id, Calibration Kit Id, Ingestion Id, Channel Id, Instrument Id, Name, Sky Footprint, Path, Alpha, Delta, Equinox, Object, Date Obs, Exp time, Photc Header, Photc Custom, Photk, Airmass, Absorption, Checksum, Gain, Ingestion Date, Flat, Mask, Reg, QSO Status)
Image-Task Relation
Image-Task Relation (I--T Id, Image Id, Processing Task Id)
Image-Tag Relation
Image-Tag Relation (I--T Id, Image Id, Tag Id)
Image Selections
Image Selections (Selection Id, Django's User Id, Name, Data, Date)
Ingestion
Ingestion (Ingestion Id, Django's User Id, Label, Start Ingestion Date, End Ingestion Date, Email, Path, Check Fitsverify, Check QSO Status, Check Multiple Ingestion, Exit Code, Report)
Instrument
Instrument (Instrument Id, Name, Telescope, Url, Timezone, Altitude, Nchips, Astrinstru_key, Photinstru_key, Path)
Misc Data
Misc Data (Misc Id, Django's User Id, Key, Data, Date)
Processing Kind
Processing Kind (Processing Kind Id, Internal Name, Label)
Processing Task
Processing Task (Processing Task Id, Django's User Id, Processing Kind Id, Start Date, End Date, Success, Error Log, Hostname, Results Output Directory, Title)
Run
Run (Run Id, Instrument Id, Name, PI, Url, Email, Process Request Date, Date Start, Date End, Date Download, Release Date)
Run-Image Relation
Run-Image Relation (R--I Id, Image Id, Run Id)
Site Profile
Site Profile (Profile Id, GUI Style, Default Condor Setup)
SCAMP Plugin
SCAMP Plugin (SCAMP Id, Processing Task Id, Config, Results Ingestion Log, HTTP Url, LDAC Files, Thumbnails)
Survey
Survey (Survey Id, Name, Comment, Url)
Survey-Instrument Relation
Survey-Instrument Relation (S--I Id, Survey Id, Instrument Id)
SWARP Plugin
SWARP Plugin (SWARP Id, Processing Task Id, Config, Results Ingestion Log, HTTP Url, Thumbnails, Weight Path, Use QFITS Weights, Head Path, Use Head Files)
Tag
Tag (Tag Id, User Id, Name, Style, Date, Comment)
User-Survey Relation
User-Survey Relation (U--S Id, User Id, Survey Id)
